website_summaries.verdict: A very sturdy hard case that offers great protection but can vary in how it's delivered.
pros: This 45-inch long hard case fits any standard dreadnought acoustic guitar
The plush lining keeps your guitar safe from bumps and scratches
The entire case is very sturdy and reinforced with upgraded latches and hinges
cons: Some received cases that were damaged in shipping

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and fit my Yamaha bass perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I know most people think "a case is a case", but I own over 20 guitars, and can say, they are not. This case is well built, the lining is soft and will protect your axe well. The handle is strong and no worries it will break. My only disappointment is that it doesn't say "Yamaha" anywere on the outside of the case. I do know someone else asked this question, and someone said it did have the logo on the exterior. The case is pretty "plane Jane" and no ID on it anywhere. This may be a plus for someone needing a bass case and is not using a Yamaha brand bass.
customer_reviews.author: Loral R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Solid Protection at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I'd bought the previous model ~3 years ago, and it was more than adequate. This version is much beefier, something you'll notice as soon as you swing open the cover. Apparently the case is very well reinforced and braced, because there is none of the sloppiness and twisting across the hinges you'd get with a cheaper case. The padding and material inside is super plush, as well. I'd trust this to protect a much more expensive guitar than any I've got!
customer_reviews.author: Flynbike

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!!
customer_reviews.text: Recently a friend bought a Yamaha acoustic guitar and gave it to me to set up for him. I don't remember what model number he got, but I found that this was supposed to fit it. And it does. Perfectly. I've only had the cheaper old school cardboard type cases before. I used to get them for like $20 all day long. But this case, let me tell you.... is definitely worth the money! I'd feel comfortable throwing this thing in the truck bed and go camping and not even worry about my guitar. I'll probably be getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stingerssx

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive case for 1/2 size guitar
customer_reviews.text: Cases for half-size guitars can be a little hard to come by: This is a well padded canvass case designed to fit a 1/2 size Yamaha classical guitar. It's less than a hard shell case, but more than a gig bag, and at the price it's a pretty good deal. Black, water resistant exterior; well attached handles (which unfortunately don't link together); a large zippered pouch will hold standard-sized music books, strap, and picks. Nylon zippers appear to be fairly heavy duty and well-attached. I gave one of these to an 8-year old, and it -- and the guitar -- are still intact, so that says something.
customer_reviews.author: Dr HTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Far better than my other guitar cases and inexpensive as well!  Great for Yamaha FS800
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case at Guitar Center and I just wasn't pleased with it. It wasn't particularly well built and it was way more expensive than my other cases. I took it back and ordered this one and it is awesome! It is very sturdy and the price is incredible for the quality. I gig with it multiple times a week and I very pleased with it, compared to the Roadrunner cases I was using on my other guitars. It seems pretty well sealed, since I don't have to add water too often to the in-case humidifier. Sizewise, it's a perfect fit for the Yamaha FS800, 830, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Review: EG-Hard Case Hardshell for Ibanez Mikro Bass
customer_reviews.text: THIS Yamaha Access Electric Guitar Case was purchased by our studio for production ending in January 2020. Our bass player used it daily to travel from home to our studio here and on location. It was purchased for one of two guitars we tried and the one we chose one using a Gator case. We tried it for our Ibanez Mikro Bass and it fits perfectly and is as quality a product as the best cases we've used for any instrument. The Mikro Bass comes with a gig bag but if you want yours to last for generations, consider this Yamaha case. Duffy Odum, Weemus Studio 2020, Adel GA
customer_reviews.author: Weemus Studio 2020

customer_reviews.title: Fits FG830 Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a big box with no additional padding and I became immediately worried that the freight company would have banged it up. But, it came out of the box in great condition. I have a new Yamaha FG830 and it fit in the case like a glove. It's exactly what I needed and it seems of pretty good quality including 4 latches, one of which is locking in the event you have the need.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: Great case APX
customer_reviews.text: Second one purchased for APX guitars. Good advice we follow and are passing along: Buy the EXACT case that goes with your ax! You've spent a packet on the instrument, spend a little more and get it the protection it needs if you're going to take it out of your home or studio. The cost delta between and aftermarket case and one offered* by the manufacturer is negligible to ante up and do it right. *Offered because virtually all cases are outsourced just like the components of the guitar. Oops, that might have been a spoiler too...
customer_reviews.author: Actual Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Fender 3/4 classical guitar and it fit perfectly. Case is very well made. Padding makes it seem almost as hard as a hard case. I would not hesitate to put this in my car with other luggage. It will take moderate abuse. The backpack straps are padded and comfortable and adjustable. The outside zippered pocket will fit a standard spiral notebook and a few small items. The sale price is amazing for this quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moss

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Yamaha A1M. Nice and snug, accommodates electronics on top of the guitar. The right fit was a concern after purchasing my guitar. I did not want to go through the hassle of returning something too small or something that swallowed the guitar. This case is the perfect fit for the Yamaha A series. Good quality for the price. Handle may be a a bit flimsy but time will tell. Overall a good buy for protecting your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Rumplestilskin

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case 3 times and had to send it back 3 times because they were all damaged. The first one was scuffed up, and the coating was ripped and you could see the wood underneath. The second one had stitching coming undone along the outside. The third one, the lid wouldn't line up and shut when I put my guitar in it. It's ridiculous how poor the quality of this product is, would not recommend buying this case
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Schlueter

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: I considered many options (on Amazon) in the lower end price range for a hard guitar case. I needed it to fit a Yamaha Dreadnought. After comparing measurements and prices I decided to spend a little more on the Yamaha case and I was not disappointed. The padding is much better than some of the less expensive cases I have seen used and it fits the guitar like a glove, no slipping around inside the case. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice plush case.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, great quality and padding, looks great, fits my Yamaha FG like a glove. Have no problem putting this in the car for a road trip. Perfect for my needs. This is not the ideal case for commercial air travel. There is no place to a put a TSA lock. The locks on it might get bent/damaged. If you need to travel by plane, there are better hard plastic cases for that purpose. .
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Protection
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between the soft or hard case and decided on the soft due to price, weight, and mobility. I'm very satisfied with the soft case as it provides excellent all around protection (it's quite rigid) for my acoustic Yamaha FG850. I use it primarily to store my guitar when not in use but expect that it will be more than sufficient if taking it out and about. Nice to have the backpack-style straps as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pak

customer_reviews.title: Fits my concert-style guitar perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought the classical-sized soft case for my smaller-bodied Yamaha FS800 concert-style guitar (after taking measurements to get some confidence it would fit), and it's a great fit. I like how rigid and supportive the structure of the bag is while still providing padding for the precious cargo. The quality and craftsmanship are obvious as soon as you handle it. And you can't go wrong with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Gulberry

customer_reviews.title: Was supposed to fit, but didn't.
customer_reviews.text: A nice sturdy case, well padded, secure feeling latches, but it just didn't fit my Yamaha FG-160 despite the guitar being below all the interior measurements and the description saying it would fit an FG series. Case was too long, the guitar's upper bout barely squeezed in, and the inner compartment is so big that there's barely room for the fingerboard. When I opened the case, I could hear the "ping" of strings releasing from being compressed. Not happy about having to return it, shipping is gonna be killer.
customer_reviews.author: N.E.H.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my 9 year old child, who has a child size guitar. It does fit in this case, however this case is definitely for adult size guitars. I am keeping it though because it keeps the guitar safe. It's very sturdy, it arrived in a nice box, and its actually a really nice case inside. It brings two keys so you can lock the case as well. I have only one issue with it...its heavy. It's at least 10 pounds so my child cannot actually travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nerual

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty close to being the right size but a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gig bag for a RBX270F. It's pretty close to being the right size but a bit too roomy for the body and length. There's no neck strap, but the headstock is cushioned and kept in place by the bag's inner diameter. I don't know why Yamaha didn't provide gig bags or cases for the RBX line of basses. Of all the bass cases I've tried, this one came the closest and is very reasonable in cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Ko

customer_reviews.title: Great Case - Snug, not too small
customer_reviews.text: I had seen a few reviews saying that this case was too small for a dreadnought, so I was concerned about purchasing this for my Yamaha FG 830. However, I find that this case is just snug, and that the plush is quite stiff at first. After having used this case for almost two months the case seems to be "worked in" and it doesn't feel like a squeeze to get the guitar in the case. I like that it is a snug fit, as it protects the guitar better than if there was space for it to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Aubs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Yamaha FS830
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for the perfect case for the Yamaha FS830 I had purchased for my daughters birthday. I wasted too much time searching, when this was the perfect case all along! It is a PERFECT fit because it is made to be the EXACT fit for the Yamaha FS series guitars! It is solid, well made and very high quality! Must have investment to protect the guitar!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Solida. 1/2 price of most retail cases.  Outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.text: Built like an absolute tank with a very cushy interior. Grabs my Ibanez and Yamaha guitars and keeps them snuggly encased. There is some offgassing occurring from whatever materials they make these out of, but not anything worth losing a star over. I got one for Christmas and immediately bought another with Amazon gift cards I received.
customer_reviews.author: jimoneyhinkins

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my guitar. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for a Takamine GC1CE classical guitar. The guitar fits perfectly inside with no sliding around. Seems well made, good hardware for the latches and padding inside is nice. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: shark22bv

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well made for general use.
customer_reviews.text: The case fit's my Yamaha FS-TA (Grand Concert sized guitar) perfectly! It seems to be very sold and well made. I would be at ease throwing this case in the back of my car. However, I don't think i'll every be using it as a flight case to check a guitar on a plane. It's just not that kind of case. There was one blemish in the surface finish of the case but I don't care because it's going to get scratched up anyways so who cares!
customer_reviews.author: ezra

customer_reviews.title: Case has a chemical smell that has not dissipated in over a month.
customer_reviews.text: Case has a chemical smell that has not dissipated in over a month. Upon receipt I allowed the case to air out for a week. I've allowed it many other times to air over the next 3 weeks and the chemical smell will not dissipate. Aside from the smell the case seems sturdy and reasonably made; however, there are likely better options available without a toxic, chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Gilford S.

customer_reviews.title: used, better than I thought it would be. (purchased 'used - like new')
customer_reviews.text: delivered, much faster than anything else, more than a month faster than anything I've ordered recently. It was used, said like new, not quite like new, there is one deep nick. My guitar is at the luthier so I am unable to currently check the fit, though, it is what it is designed for, so Im sure it will be fine. plenty of storage room for picks, tuner, and strings, might be able to put my tiny book of chords in the compartment too. would be nice if it had a pouch for a music book though. The inside of the case is immaculate, soft, plush, and padded, the outside, one ding, well worth the savings.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Charles Guth

customer_reviews.title: Fits the offset neck Fender Jaguar bass. This was a risk, but it paid off
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy for a $100 case. What’s important beyond that is my Fender Jaguar bass fits perfectly. I’m really happy with the way it looks. The outside has a nice texture and the inside is plush and has slightly more that moderate protection. They only thing that bothers me is the dye in the internal fur smells a little weird.
customer_reviews.author: Edgehaha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the eg-hc Yamaha case for a revstar 620...I was a little reluctant knowing that the "mij" model comes with a nice case and how this could replicate that (from pictures)...the top of it is somewhat flimsy...but the sum its parts are solid and more than adequately strong and beats a gig bag by light years...Hardware is descent as well...anybody on the fence?...Dont be...this thing fits the revstar 620 like a glove and is a quality yamaha product...more than pleased.Warehouse deals came through and big praise/kudos for them,thx...
customer_reviews.author: david r. smith

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, perfect fit. It’s a bit heavy and that’s EXACTLY what I was looking for. My guitar was a gift from my father 50 years ago and I have been fortunate it survived the cardboard case all these years. It’s a Ventura V14 and I am so happy to have this case as I return to playing with my Saddleback small group.
customer_reviews.author: sarge

customer_reviews.title: Very nice guitar case
customer_reviews.text: This case is designed to fit Yamaha FS800 guitars. The fit is just right, there is a lot of padding on the inside. There is a little ribbon that holds the top cover at a 90 degree angle when open. Multiple clasps for locking the case. You can stand the case vertically or place it horizontally because there are little metal bumpers on it. It's a little heavy, but that's only because the cover is so thick.
customer_reviews.author: bkoyl

customer_reviews.title: Great case but wrong size sent
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. It's very solid and well constructed. I'm giving three stars because I bought the Dreadnought case (AG1-HC) which, according to the measurements advertised, should've fit my guitar perfectly. I was so surprised when the case was over an inch too narrow. Checking the case to see why I saw I was sent the AG3-HC case which is for a classical guitar. Quality control is obviously lacking in the shipping department. I'll return mine and hope to get the correct one when I reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Yamaha APX600 Thin Body
customer_reviews.text: Although my guitar fits, it's very snug (which isn't a bad thing really), but it's almost a tension like fit. Other than not being cut especially for the apx600, it works.. and fits the depth very nice. The build quality is a little light for a busy musician, but for the $79, you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Product was ordered on Thursday with free shipping from Gear Nuts through Amazon. Product was delivered the next day. Product fit my Yamaha APX guitar perfectly and seems to be excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of them
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought for yamaha FG820 solid top acoustic guitar. It fits like a glove, the body just slides in without any play. The guitar is secured! The second case I bought for a fender CD-60S acoustic guitar. It fits with the body having very little play and I mean very little. Both cases are top quality as was the packaging. The delivering was on time, the first case was a day early. Both are hard cases and the padding is close to 1/4 inch thick. Most important the cases is not over-sized. It only takes up as much room as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with faulty lid hinges
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with Hinges that were loose and not connected - they fell off the first time opening the case and 3 pins were missing. We used DeWalt adhesive to glue the hinges back on because trying to ship this huge item back is a nightmare. This manufacturer should reassess how the hinges are engineered for a guitar case. Other than the manufacturing defects, the case is overall pretty nice. Just order some JB weld or DeWalt epoxy when ordering this case to fix the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: brandon w boe

customer_reviews.title: good thick padding.. nice universal dreadnaught fit..
customer_reviews.text: This is for a yamaha FG830 which fills it out quite nicely. I also have an FS800 here and even that will work though a bit loose. I like the cover handles backstraps pouch... all good. I would rather have this than a hard case.. it's so light and secures the guitar just right.
customer_reviews.author: Twang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very well made case, lightweight but protects my son's 1/2 size guitar very well. I thought it would come folded, but it came in a GIANT box. The sides are very stiff, so folding wouldn't have been possible I guess (and may have damaged the case). If you're looking for a case for anything but heavy travel (or being checked luggage) this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: 3 isn’t the magic number
customer_reviews.text: First one comes in has two flaws outside the case Second one the clasps are all loose doesn’t close right Third one the stitching and boarder is coming apart I don’t usually give a review but this was so disappointing over and over again REALLY WHERE IS YOUR QUALITY control 😔
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Crispi

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. My Breedlove Discovery concert acoustic just fits with some careful pressure. Have yet to thoroughly appraise it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Quality is awesome
customer_reviews.text: So I was searching for guitar cases and I ordered my results from “highest reviews first”. This was the first one I stumbled across and I’m glad that it was. The case seriously surprised me with how good its quality is and just how protective that it really is. Very glad I purchased this case and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M.J1221

customer_reviews.title: Basically good.
customer_reviews.text: The case is roomy and easily accommodated our old Gianinni guitar. The case seems strong and the felt adequate. My only issues are that the lid for the pick box feels a bit cheap and like it won’t last as long as the case, and I have to adjust the top of the case to align it every time I shut it or it won’t close completely.
customer_reviews.author: E. Milkes

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha AG-SC Soft Case Review
customer_reviews.text: This case was more than I expected it to be and I'm here to say that this is a great case. This is a quality product. The case is very light weight, but very durable and my FG 840 fits perfectly inside of it. The internal fabric used is very soft, and the padding is more than sufficient. If you need a case that will protect your guitar, this will do the trick. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Maneke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case for my RevStar
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews on other Yamaha cases (including acoustic guitars) made me wonder about the quality of these cases. My electric case for my Yamaha RevStar arrived in excellent shape, and the guitar fit perfectly. The case seems very sturdy and secure. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: strat_lover

customer_reviews.title: Quite Good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a touring musician. I don't even gig very often. But, for general storage and travel to an occasional jam, this semi-rigid case seems to be just the thing. It seems to be quite well-made and fits my FG850 like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged or just poor quality?
customer_reviews.text: Case arrived with significant damage. Top was separated from the bottom. One latch was separated from the bottom. Based on the failures, I really question the quality of any sold.
customer_reviews.author: TheRealMrWendell

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this case after reading the reviews. However, after taking the case out of the box I noticed one latch that was missing a screw and when I opened the box one latch completely fell off. After further inspection I noticed this latch also was missing a screw. The case was also damaged in shipping which I attached pictures. I wasnt expecting anything fancy just wanted something to keep my guitar safe. I would not recommend buying this case if you love your guitar.
customer_reviews.author: HoustonCole

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Yamaha CGS Student 1/2-Size
customer_reviews.text: This fits the Yamaha CGS Student Classical Guitar Natural 1/2-Size perfectly. No extra room, but might affect tuning when taking the guitar out. Pocket is large enough for a snark tuner, a music book, and two folding footrests.
customer_reviews.author: Standoffish Dan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality - heavily padded, and high quality zipper. Straps to carry by hand or as a "back pack." The 1/2 size case fits the corresponding size guitar exactly - no wiggle room. My order was received 3-4 earlier than projected delivery date when I placed the order. I am extremely happy with this purchase and would highly recommend this product as it definitely provides a high degree of protection for the guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Case ! But, You guys can do better. . . .
customer_reviews.text: I love the case, however it was dented, scratched, & some of the black has peeled off on the outside. I really need this case and it fits my guitar like a glove. I'm pretty sure it will be protected.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Nothing a few stickers can't fix.
customer_reviews.text: Structurally it holds up ok. The outside though scuffs some and as long as you have enough hipster stickers on it you should be good. It fits on some airplanes, but holds up well in cargo too. Actually a great case for the amount of abuse I put it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality guitar case
customer_reviews.text: Pictures really don’t do justice for this gorgeous guitar case! We bought this for our son who really needed to house his guitar -and as he opened it in Christmas Day we all marveled at the quality, durability and attention to detail! He’ll have this case for years to come! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Yamaha AG2-HC Hardshell Acoustic Guitar Case is Strong and Beautifully Made
customer_reviews.text: Yamaha AG2-HC Hardshell Acoustic Guitar Case for APX and NTX Series guitars are perfect for protecting your valuable guitar investment. Highly Recommended for worry-free travel and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G. NielsenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for My Yamaha CG102 Classical Guitar!
customer_reviews.text: I almost went for a cheaper case, and I am so glad that I didn't. This case fits my Yamaha CG 102 Classical Guitar like a glove. The case is beautiful and very well made - sturdy. The gold clasps set off the black exterior. The interior is plushy soft and thick. This is a great case for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chava Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with my new Yamaha RS320 guitar perfect fit, but I do pack my cords around the body to keep down any movement just in case. Nice storage compartment with plenty of room for extra stings, capo and tuner even carry my Sennheiser ex835 microphone at times when needed. All in all a smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SnP. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Most useful as a storage case
customer_reviews.text: This item has fairly thick flexible foam lining, not solid foam... Is more than adequate for storing guitars when I go on vacation, etc (my purpose) or going to a lesson, but if traveling or packing with other instruments would definitely use a hard case.
customer_reviews.author: rons thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I like this case and have bought one in the past. However this time one of the latches was not attached to the case and was just hanging there. Very disappointed. I know they are not expensive cases but at least look over the functionality before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Toadgames

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second case I ordered. The first one had stitching coming apart and a ding on the bottom edge. The second one I just received has a latch that doesn't line up the top and bottom, it won't latch. Sending it back! More garbage coming out of RED China I suppose. Don't these manufacturers give a damn?
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case - Great Service
customer_reviews.text: The case is definitely sturdy. A little bit on the heavy side but, if I wanted a lightweight case, I would have gone with a different style. Perfect for what I was looking for - solid protection. Service was great. Item was received very quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Great case all around
customer_reviews.text: Bought this guitar case because I have a Yamaha guitar and want to prevent issues with guitar fitting in the case. It arrived and my FG800 guitar fitted in there like a piece. Nice compartment to store capos, tuners, etc. Abundant padding to keep my guitar intact. Ver slick pure-black look. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is too big for my TRBX 504, but padding/protection is very good
customer_reviews.text: This bag is too big for my TRBX 504, but padding/protection is very good. Since there's plenty of space around my guitar, I am thinking to add some additional padding to keep my bass guitar always centered in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Provides excellent protection for concert size guitar
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a beautiful guitar but it didn't come with a hard shell case. This particular case I bought from Amazon is not only a perfect fit--which is very important so the guitar doesn't slide around in the case--but it offers excellent protection for this new and expensive Yamaha guitar. Couldn't asl for a better product. Five stars all around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina MacFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a Yamaha LS-TA
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit my Recently purchased Yamaha LS-TA acoustic guitar. (7-2020) Non-branded simple hardshell case. I only use it for storage not for caring around everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mutant53

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, lock latch is a tad loose.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, solid case. A little lighter than I thought so that could be good or bad for some. Had that strong adhesive smell of course but that was to be expected. The latch with the lock mechanism is a little loose though and takes some finagling to close right. It appears to be nailed in so I cannot tighten it. The plush is not as soft and feathery as I expected but it will keep my guitar safe and unscratched. Overall, good case for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: fit my dreadnought like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my guitars, both dreadnoughts. fit like a glove no room to spare and that's good. Has a good felt lining and soft. Gig bags are alright but give your guitar a good home you can't beat a good hard case like these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft gig bag
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Yamaha dreadnought perfectly. The padding is very thick and the sides are firmer than most gig bags. Should offer a lot of protection for the guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Thoma

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Breedlove Pursuit Concert with cutaway like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Love this case for the money. It has a lot of VOC's coming off of it, months after purchase, but that will surely dissapate over time. Way cheaper than the case from the manufacturer (Breedlove), and very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Glover

customer_reviews.title: This is a great case!
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Yamaha perfectly and it has a lock so I can keep my kid out of it. I love it . The hard cases are hard to find but if your spending $$$ on the guitar, spend the money to protect it. Soft cases don't protect from anything but dust. I love this case.
customer_reviews.author: Odies mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my wife's new yamaha acoustic electric guitar. Seems very durable and provides plenty of protection and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Justin

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing pieces. Obviously not complete when packed in the box. Very disappointed. It was a Christmas gift. Unable to get another sent before Christmas. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: sin.......s

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, good price
customer_reviews.text: My guitar fits into this case perfectly, then again that’s what I’d expect, that the manufacture of the guitar would make a case that fits perfectly, it even has cut outs for the electronics, very nice quality case for the price
customer_reviews.author: K. Pimsakul

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! Light weight but very well padded to protect my new Yamaha classical guitar. Love it that the brand name YAMAHA is on the case. Also love the nice size storage pouch on the outside of the case. Large enough to hold my thick music folder with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Allen Braziel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Yamaha AC1M
customer_reviews.text: This is a great guitar case. It looks nice, is well built and deeply padded with plush felt. The guitar fits without any side to side movement.
customer_reviews.author: H99

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons Crestwood 2010 Guitar very difficult to find a case to fit. ** Until I found this one the body fits perfect, the neck of the guitar has a space of 4". But Because the body fits so well there is NO movement in the case. My guitar's dimension: 40.5" height 16" bottom width 12" top width 4.5" deep Also very well made. Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Lola M G

customer_reviews.title: Very very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Measure your guitar......Get one ! The case arrived today, it is very nice, solid, fits like a glove, very well padded, it's super perfect in every way. I'm puzzled by some negative reviews
customer_reviews.author: Great product for small drips

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great case for an acoustic guitar. It’s very sturdy and is holding up very well. It is a little big to carry on the school bus, but my son doesn’t bring it home from school very often.
customer_reviews.author: Amylia R.

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged. But fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: It only took 3 days to come which was nice but it came damaged a little. This is the pic that I took as soon as I unwrapped the plastic wrap. I didn’t see any damage on the delivered box and it was also well packed so I’m not really sure where it happened. It is kind of unpleasant to see this scratch on a very noticeable spot but other than that everything seems great. My fs800 guitar fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More of an overpriced gig bag than a case.
customer_reviews.text: This is more of an overpriced gig bag than a case. It is totally flexible, no rigidity whatsoever, and no compartment inside.
customer_reviews.author: E. Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: More like Yama-WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I can scarcely believe the sturdy, well crafted value this case embodies. It fits my spanking new Yamaha APX600 BL like a glove. Yamaha is rapidly becoming my new bff!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence from Hackensack

customer_reviews.title: Great product made extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. This guitar case is very sturdy and strong. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thick foam padding
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, firm gig bag. It comes shipped flat in a large box, so it is not folded or creased. The foam is very thick compared to another gig bag that I bought, so it provides good protection for the guitar.
customer_reviews.author: farmgirl64

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Fit my guitar nicely and it fits well on my back. It looks like there's a perfect space for some neck support/storage but they didn't include that. There's not enough pockets for storage but I like how sturdy and padded it is. It's stiff and holds it's form so getting the guitar in and out will be super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried about: 1. The flimsy box it arrived in but case is undamaged. 2. Whether my acoustic would fit. But, it fits my Silvertone SD-50CE in it just perfect with a finger width of room aroumd the body. I'm excited to get some use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McTeague

customer_reviews.title: a Tight  Fit for fg830 yamaha acoustic?! (please read)
customer_reviews.text: a bit tight for fg830 yamaha acoustic?! recd case appears brand new, is Tight fit on sides for yamaha fg830: it rubs on the lining/felt of case. I don't want this to scratch the finish of my guitar. I cannot understand how at least 3 reviewers specified that this case fits fg830 yamaha acoustic guitar? I also have an acoustic/electric 12 string washburn that fits perfectly in this case with room on the sides unlike the yamaha acoustic. Feel free to comment on this review esp. if you have an fg830 yamaha acoustic guitar that fits in this ag1-hc case.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a gift. I do not play and thought this was somewhat expensive. Not true. This case is an incredible value for what you get. Very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Very Hard Shell, Very plush interior, Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my new Yamaha FJX730SC (Yamaha's 'Medium Jumbo' - a cutaway dreadnaught with more curve ) just like a glove. There is no movement and not really any compression on any areas of the guitar and room for the electronics and head stock to slide in and out freely. The case has feet on the side, bottom and foot and can actually stand the case with the guitar (guitar not balanced well) upright .
customer_reviews.author: SeaCheese

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great case
customer_reviews.text: Great quality case that is sturdy and protective for my acoustic guitar. I would recommend this guitar case as a top value.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful case and a perfect fit. Only two complaints are that the locking mechanism doesnt work, and that same latch doesn't like to stay closed. Super bouncy interior when getting tips for street performance, so that makes me super optimistic in its ability to protect the guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Whelchel

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you own a Yamaha acoustic guitar in the models listed, this is by far the best case for the money that you can buy. I was blown away by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This case provides more protection and value than I thought I would get for the price. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: cartecay1

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one and stop looking. It's mother approved!
customer_reviews.text: My son used this to transport his guitar to and from school daily. It's held up over a year no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea L

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case perfect fit. So nice makes my fs smile. Too bad it arrived damage. The lid has two holes that look like a puppy took a bite. Not worth returning over. I really am pleased with the case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the guitar. Study, well built, and able to protect the guitar. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: William Nash

customer_reviews.title: Sweet fit great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and tight fit really nice quality built and amazing hardware. Blowed me away the price was cheap and the quality bwas top shelf will buy again as soon as I truck the wife into buying another guitar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hard Case for Guitar. Great Price too.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great hard case for your acoustic guitar. It has beautiful gold hardware. Extremely well padded, and perfect fit. Make sure to measure your guitar before ordering. Not much more money than a soft guitar case, and your guitar is greatly protected.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zilligen

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to protect my YAMAHA FS800 steel string acoustic guitar. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: What can I say. It's a case. Solid ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. It's a case. Solid as hell, for a fraction of what it should cost. Even if you never carry the guitar anywhere, it will appreciate such a safe place to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mason

customer_reviews.title: best guitar case
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this is the best guitar case he has ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Edith R. Church

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging, fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Fit a Yamaha Dreadnought perfectly. Arrived in perfect condition with good pacakaging. Great replacement case for a dreadnought size guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Stealyerface

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your guitar safe.
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial case. Will keep your valuable instrument safe from damage.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Perfect fit for Yamaha dreadnought guitars decent amount of storage under the neck accessories- tuner, capo, strings picks...
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great case, was perfect for my guitar
customer_reviews.text: I am a new player so wasn't sure what I needed but when it came I was impressed with how sturdy it seemed. Was heavier than I thought it would be but I feel that just means it will protect my guitar better
customer_reviews.author: virginia miller

product_meta.title: Yamaha AG1-HC Hard Case Dreadnought Acoustic Guitar Case
product_meta.description: Size:Dreadnought| Style:Hard CaseVinyl hard-shell acoustic guitar case for dreadnought & jumbo sized guitars. Fits Yamaha models: F Series, FG Series, A1 Series, A3 Series, CPX Series, FGX Series, FJX Series. Fits standard dreadnought sized acoustic guitars. Dimensions diagram below.
feature_bullets: Fits Yamaha models: F Series, FG Series, A1 Series, A3 Series, CPX Series, FGX Series, FJX Series
Fits any standard dreadnought sized acoustic guitar. Dimensions diagram below
